updates.text: [CCL] Train service is back to normal. Free regular bus services have ceased.
[CCL] Train service is resuming progressively. Free regular buses are still available btw #BuonaVista and #HarbourFront.
[CCL] Due to a power fault, please add 10 minutes additional train travel time btw #KentRidge and #Harbourfront. Free regular buses are available btw #BuonaVista and #Harbourfront.
[CCL] Due to a power fault, please add 20 minutes additional train travel time btw #KentRidge and #Harbourfront. Free regular buses are available btw #BuonaVista and #Harbourfront.
